title: sverelst
author: sverelst
content: Hi, I'm looking for a USDT loan.1000 USDT now, 1050 USDT paid back on October 1st.Anyone interested?Thanks.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: sverelst on September 13, 2022, 12:22:44 PMHi, I'm looking for a USDT loan.1000 USDT now, 1050 USDT paid back on October 1st.Anyone interested?Thanks.Collateral?

comments.author: sverelst
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on September 13, 2022, 12:30:12 PMQuote from: sverelst on September 13, 2022, 12:22:44 PMHi, I'm looking for a USDT loan.1000 USDT now, 1050 USDT paid back on October 1st.Anyone interested?Thanks.Collateral?Only the promise I get my wage and can pay back for sure that day.

comments.author: Mitch212
comments.body: You won't get a loan with a valid collateral

comments.author: sverelst
comments.body: Quote from: Mitch212 on September 13, 2022, 01:14:32 PMYou won't get a loan with a valid collateral I know it will be hard so I will give a high intrest... I'm honest so I try, who knows...

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: contact me if you found someone i'm also looking thanks

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Quote from: sverelst on September 13, 2022, 01:23:23 PMQuote from: Mitch212 on September 13, 2022, 01:14:32 PMYou won't get a loan with a valid collateral I know it will be hard so I will give a high intrest... I'm honest so I try, who knows...High interest means nothing if you have nothing to lose.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Again with these loans of nonsense, newbie asking for a huge loan without any collateral, yeah it seem so legit Xd. And the funny think is saying I’m honest which can make everybody believe you, wait few moments you will be contacted by elon musk to receive your loan plus one million dollar as bonus for your honesty.

comments.author: sverelst
comments.body: Quote from: GxSTxV on September 13, 2022, 03:16:04 PMAgain with these loans of nonsense, newbie asking for a huge loan without any collateral, yeah it seem so legit Xd. And the funny think is saying I’m honest which can make everybody believe you, wait few moments you will be contacted by elon musk to receive your loan plus one million dollar as bonus for your honesty.Don't judge me. I always honored my committments.

comments.author: condoras
comments.body: Quote from: sverelst on September 13, 2022, 03:30:19 PMQuote from: GxSTxV on September 13, 2022, 03:16:04 PMAgain with these loans of nonsense, newbie asking for a huge loan without any collateral, yeah it seem so legit Xd. And the funny think is saying I’m honest which can make everybody believe you, wait few moments you will be contacted by elon musk to receive your loan plus one million dollar as bonus for your honesty.Don't judge me. I always honored my committments.Says who? You?

comments.author: sverelst
comments.body: Quote from: condoras on September 13, 2022, 04:02:48 PMQuote from: sverelst on September 13, 2022, 03:30:19 PMQuote from: GxSTxV on September 13, 2022, 03:16:04 PMAgain with these loans of nonsense, newbie asking for a huge loan without any collateral, yeah it seem so legit Xd. And the funny think is saying I’m honest which can make everybody believe you, wait few moments you will be contacted by elon musk to receive your loan plus one million dollar as bonus for your honesty.Don't judge me. I always honored my committments.Says who? You?Yes. And I don't force anyone to lend me money. I know I ask a lot and I know there is risk as you don't know me. That's why I offer a huge intrest. If anyone dares to take the risk, they shall be rewarded as I always do what I say. If nobody does, fair enough, then there is no deal. But I suppose I am allowed to ask this. I don't force anyone and I do nothing wrong.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: sverelst on September 13, 2022, 03:30:19 PMDon't judge me. I always honored my committments.As new user without any history and also without collateral, your request asks for a donation or a negative feedback.And I'm 100% people are not into this kind of "donations".I am sure you also know that you describing yourself has no value in this matter.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Quote from: sverelst on September 13, 2022, 04:08:59 PMYes. And I don't force anyone to lend me money. I know I ask a lot and I know there is risk as you don't know me. That's why I offer a huge intrest. If anyone dares to take the risk, they shall be rewarded as I always do what I say. If nobody does, fair enough, then there is no deal. But I suppose I am allowed to ask this. I don't force anyone and I do nothing wrong.Asking for a loan without any collateral is wrong. Thinking that people are all with a low iq like you is wrong. Offering 5% of interests for 1000$ let say even with a good collateral for this amount of time is wrong. Stop saying me like you’re the president of united states. Nobody knows you and nobody will loan you this money without collateral so close this thread and cut your hoseshit

comments.author: sverelst
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on September 13, 2022, 04:12:30 PMQuote from: sverelst on September 13, 2022, 03:30:19 PMDon't judge me. I always honored my committments.As new user without any history and also without collateral, your request asks for a donation or a negative feedback.And I'm 100% people are not into this kind of "donations".I am sure you also know that you describing yourself has no value in this matter.Then just ignore my question, I'm sorry, I was clearly wrong to post this. I'll take my time to learn what I can and can't do on this forum.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: sverelst on September 13, 2022, 03:30:19 PMI always honored my committments.Nobody here knows if you have always honored your commitments for sure and you know it in your mind. Try a friend or relatives if you want a loan with no collateral. in this forum, you won't even get a no-collateral loan of $5. Believe me.

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: Hey leave him alone okay people make mistakes as do I  like he said he does nothing wrong with asking this question  if you don't like how about you ignore this post  okay ? by the way  verelst are you from belgium ?

comments.author: okorieemmanuel
comments.body: Quote from: sverelst on September 13, 2022, 12:22:44 PMHi, I'm looking for a USDT loan.1000 USDT now, 1050 USDT paid back on October 1st.Anyone interested?Thanks.This amount is huge . $1000 !!!. Y don't u reduce it. Maybe someone generous would give u. Be realistic! Even banks may waive some rules when giving small loans compared with large ones.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on September 13, 2022, 10:09:28 PM500 € is less   i'm giving 10 % intrest 550 € So, your thread with 6 pages is not enough for you, now you come here to ask loan. Although you must have already received an explanation several times why there is no possibility to get free money here, you are still trolling.the fact that you're asking for twice as much as the OP doesn't make you any more attractive.for both of you, the purpose of this forum is not a gift of money between strangers, you misunderstood something, and here come people who throw away money.

comments.author: jkoil
